title: FS: T211 Red Sun Greminger, Montgomery
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: FS: T211 Red Sun Greminger, Montgomery
posts.post_content:
For sale is a copy of the T211 Red Sun cigarettes Ed Greminger.  He was player/manager for the Montgomery Climbers.

Condition is a little rough, but if you are reading this thread you probably know how difficult individual T211s are.  The price is $350 via secure shipping.  Incidentally, I also have his T210 available.

Please email me at [url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url] if interested.  Thank you.
